titleStmt.title: Annotations upon the Holy Bible. Vol. I wherein the sacred text is inserted, and various readings annex'd, together with parallel scriptures, the more difficult terms in each verse are explained, seeming contradictions reconciled, questions and doubts resolved, and the whole text opened / by the late reverend and learned divine Mr. Matthew Poole.
titleStmt.author: Poole, Matthew, 1624-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Richardson, for Thomas Parkhurst, Dorman Newman, Jonathan Robinson, Bradbazon Ailmer, Thomas Cockeril, and Benjamin Alsop,

notesStmt.note: Engraved frontispiece portrait of author opposite t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
